Comment 1 by **reddooots**: 
I just noticed 8g only ask for 774 mb of virtual memory so the test should be.

package main

func main() {
	s := make([][]byte, 700)
	mb := 1024 * 1024
	for i := 0; i < len(s); i++ {
		s[i] = make([]byte, mb)
	}
}

I'm guessing 700 should be fine as I think that would make s only a little over 700mb
leaving 73mb free.
